list.abs: all of a sudden , one day early , squally showers the earth with impunity to attack . I very worried about the birds will be singing it today ?突然，有一天清晨，狂风骤雨肆无忌惮地袭击着大地。我很忧虑，今天鸟儿还会歌唱吗？

entry.def: In squally weather, there are sudden strong winds which often cause brief, violent storms.

example.ex: The competitors had to contend with squally weather conditions.
example.tran: 参赛者不得不应付狂风肆虐的天气条件。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by short periods of noisy commotion;

sentences.sentence: "a home life that has been extraordinarily squally"

means.word_mean: 2. characterized by brief periods of violent wind or rain;
